DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare health care delivery outcomes cost achieved two different approach health care delivery . The investigator compare health outcome group adult patent diabetes . One group manage traditional approach diabetes care . The second group 's care delivery structure accord design consistent Chronic Care Model ( CCM ) .
DOC.detailed_description: The study compare effect intervention target subset diabetic patient within primary care practice resource utilization resource disease outcomes entire population patient diabetes practice . The effect also compare across entire panel patient assign physician 2 arm study .
